title: MC exceeds MR, decrease output to increase profit

content.prompt: At the current quantity that a firm is selling, the firm has marginal revenue of $750 and marginal cost of $800. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: The firm’s profits would increase if the firm increased the quantity sold.
The firm’s profits would increase if the firm decreased the quantity sold.
The firm earns negative economic profit.
The firm earns zero accounting profit.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
